title: Trend Setters Harley Quinn – Poison Ivy – Catwoman – DC Comics Women – Heart Shaped Hanging Acrylic Print Accessory – Perfect for Gifting or Collecting
features: Catwoman, Harley Quinn and Poison Ivy - also known as the Gotham City Sirens. These popular female criminals are pictured together on this hanging acrylic accessory - I’m sure they’re not up to anything villainous.

Vivid and light-catching officially licensed accessory, making for a gorgeous display in windows, on walls and more. Our hanging acrylic decorations are created by permanently fusing the art to the item's surface.
Don't let the high-quality design deceive you - our shaped acrylics are flat. This 2D shaped and 3/16" thick flat acrylic decoration measures 3.5” width x 3" height.
Made with care in the USA by Trend Setters Ltd. with durable, long-lasting acrylic. Unlike cheap plastic, our thick hanging acrylics are strong enough to be displayed for years to come.
Clean with a soft microfiber cloth. Your product arrives in a velveteen red bag to make gifting and storage a breeze.
description: This officially licensed heart-shaped hanging acrylic features Catwoman, Harley Quinn, and Poison Ivy. I’m sure they’re not up to anything villainous.  The image is fused directly and permanently into an acrylic piece for a long-lasing, light-catching collectible!  We create images that are actually made of acrylic!  Trend Setters Ltd. fuses our licensed designs and images into unique, durable acrylic decor. Hang them on your tree or on any wall year-round.  They also look great in windows or cars due to their light-catching properties.  Image is viewable from front and back.
